summary.para: Developers should use instead. Gets a formatted, Unicode string representation of a property value.

param.name: ppropvar
param.para: A structure that contains the type and value of the property.

param.name: puiff
param.para: The format for the returned property value.
0x00000002. Use the short format version of the string.
0x00000004. Truncate time to days, not hours/mins/sec.
0x00000008. Use the friendly name for date: "Today", "Yesterday", and so on.

param.name: pwszText
param.para: The property value, formatted for display.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Developers should use instead. Gets the width of the property description.

param.name: pcxChars
param.para: The width of the property description.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Developers should use instead. Gets a string specifying the name of the property suitable for display to users.

param.name: flags
param.para: One of the following PROPERTYUI_NAME_FLAGS values:

param.name: cchText
param.para: The length of the property display name.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Developers should use instead. Gets property feature flags for a specified property.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

param.name: pwszHelpFile
param.para: The fully qualified path of the Help file.

param.name: puHelpID
param.para: The Help context ID for the property.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Developers should use instead. Gets the property description of a specified property.

param.name: cchText
param.para: The length of the property description.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Developers should use instead. Reads the characters of the specified property name and identifies the FMTID and PROPID of the property.

param.name: pszName
param.para: A string specifying the property name to parse.

param.name: pfmtid
param.para: The FMTID of the parsed property.

param.name: ppid
param.para: The PROPID of the parsed property name.

param.name: pchEaten
param.para: The number of characters that were consumed in parsing pszName.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
